name: BEST WESTERN La Corniche

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked a Standard room, but the hotel wasn't fully booked for the first of our two nights, so we were given the choice of an upgrade for the first night with a move to a Standard room for the second night or a Standard room and no move. We chose the former, and had a room with a balcony, then moved to a smaller room. Both were fine, well-kept. Our only problem was that the water coming out of the cold water faucet in the sink was warm. I suspect this is not a new situation, as the hotel made a point of giving us a bottle of cold mineral water each day.
reviews.title: A nice hotel for a short stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013
reviews.text: There was free parking behind the hotel (and a lobby-level entrance) or on the street in front of the hotel.
reviews.title: Great sea views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: This hotel is right on the harbour overlooking the bay. My room had 2 balconies, comfortable bed, coffee maker and good bathroom. Very friendly and super quick check in and out and lovely breakfast. Quiet location and I was able to sleep with the patio doors open.
reviews.title: Best Western Toulon - Hotel La Corniche

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are currently staying at The Best Western Hotel Toulon and we cannot understand that it is only rated No 4 in Toulon! What a beautiful little Hotel, in a fabulous location with staff who are prepared to assist, if possible, with all requests be it for extra toiletries, coffee in the Courtyard or local advice. Everything is delivered with a smile. We needed some Laundry done - it is not generally done on a Sunday, however that was offered to us without question and it was back in our Room just after Lunch today (Sunday).
reviews.title: Beautiful and convenient location, hard to find in the dark!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: We had noted all the reviews re Noise, size of Rooms etc etc and were somewhat sceptical about staying here. We had been at another Hotel in Toulon - that Hotel has a higher Star Rating - we don't know why. We're just so pleased that we changed Hotels - we would class it as "Boutique" - this has made this section of a Business Trip an extremely enjoyable experience.
reviews.title: Great location, great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: A lovely hotel excellent location, good quality rooms, breakfast was excellent and the staff only too happy to help. My only issue was on noise and privacy for the rooms behind reception, which tend to suffer a bit with passing traffic in the road behind. But that was not a major issue. Just don't leave your curtains open or the bathroom window ajar else drivers there will get an eyeful :)
reviews.title: Lovely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Our very comfortable, fully equipped room with 2 separate beds and outstanding matrasses has a wonderful view over the lovely bay. Unfortunately it was not possible to get an upgrade for a suite room with great balcony and walk-in shower, because the hotel was fully booked.
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: The reception staff was very courteous and helpful with directions and recommendations.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We regularly used the free WiFi connection.
reviews.title: Overlooks the beach at Le Mourillon, but on a busy bus route and main road

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was lovely to sit, read, rest and take a drink on the nice patio.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel for Toulon visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband & I stayed here before taking a cruise. A great choice. Very clean & updated. Nice courtyard area to sit in. Great view, right across the street from the Mediterranean Sea. Our room was small with 2 large suitcases we were taking on a week cruise but it was only for one night. I am sure if we were staying longer we would have been given a larger room. The bathroon has the European shower with the half glass door. I still have difficulty not getting water all over the floor. The staff were very friendly, and helpful. They do have a breakfast buffet for a charge, 12 Euros I think. I would recommend this hotel & would stay there the next time we are in Toulon.
reviews.title: Great hotel with an view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the hotel for 3 nights in October - I booked it after reading Tripadvisor reviews and it didnt let me down in any way. The location is fantastic with beaches just 5 minutes walk away and Toulon centre about 20 minutes walk. There is a good bus service with a stop just outside so you have the choice of walking into the centre or taking a 5 minute bus ride. I asked for a sea view room and was not disappointed - watching the sunset each night was a special moment. The rooms are clean and a good size. I found the hotel staff spoke good English and were very happy to offer advice on local restaurants and places to visit. Overall - a hotel and location I would recommend to anyone looking for a relaxing break.
reviews.title: Great location and a good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at La Corniche for just one night as we were just passing through Toulon. We were pleasantly surprised that we got upgraded to a suite on the top floor. The rooms are a good size, adequately furnished. This is a good, not luxury, hotel. The staff was very helpful, attentive. While the hotel is about a 20 minute walk from downtown, it has a great view. So try to get a hotel on a higher floor as it really is a nice view, but the elevator really only holds 1-2 people, no luggage, at a time. The restaurants down the street were nothing special, so it might be better to go downtown for dinner.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for three nights - I had booked a very last minute holiday and picked this following reviews on trip advisor.
reviews.title: Good hotel in a brilliant location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was very nice. It is a four star hotel, and the was nothing I would complain about.
reviews.title: Great find.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel for three nights when in the area for a friend's wedding. The staff was very nice, and the hotel's common rooms and courtyard were attractive. Our room was small but had a spacious balcony with a spectacular view over the bay. It was a lovely place to sit, read and rest in between out events. If you choose to pay for it, the hotel's breakfast is quite good with many choices.
reviews.title: Charming small hotel in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011
reviews.text: The hotel's location is also good: there is a walkway along Toulon's extensive public beach that begins just outside the hotel. The city's daily market is a 10 minute walk. The desk staff is happy to call taxis for you if you need to go further.
reviews.title: Good quality. At seaside.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: Hotelvisit in may 2011. Reception ok. Parking outside crowded. We took a box. Quit small for 12 €. Room very nice, quiet and spacious. Last minute suite, taking the Ferry to Corsica. We had no breakfast but prepared our own.
reviews.title: Tranquil soothing charming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Comfortable hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent in all respects. Place to stay in Toulon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A first class suite on the 4th floor with stunning views of the harbour. Efficient, professional, fast staff and delightful breakfast area overlooking the harbour indoor and outdoor choices. Loved it. Will be back soon.
reviews.title: Nice, but a little high priced

description: Facing the Mediterranean sea, the Best Western hotel La Corniche is situated a few steps aways from one of the most beautiful beaches from the coast.Ideally located in the Mourillon district, facing the small fishing port St Louis, the hotel will welcome you in a warm and unique atmosphere.The Best Western hotel La Corniche respects an eco-friendly way of life and is proud of its Ecolabel certification.
